item.title: 11 bit studios Digital Showcase 2025 set for December 8
item.content:encoded:
Updates on Frostpunk 2, Moonlighter 2, The Alters, and more.

11 bit studios will host its first-ever digital showcase on December 8 at 10:00 a.m. PT / 1:00 p.m. ET, the company announced. You will be able to watch it on YouTube.

The broadcast will feature “some inside looks at many titles in the 11 bit studios library,” including new Frostpunk 2 downloadable content, Moonlighter 2: The Endless Vault Early Access plans, new content for The Alters, and launch information for Death Howl, as well as “a surprise or two.”



https://www.gematsu.com/2025/12/11-bit-studios-digital-showcase-2025-set-for-december-8
